1) Am

x = 1.83629E-7 - 1.20073999999999970e-009 = 1.82428260000000010e-007
sigma = 5.21891E-8

2) Am_2

x = 1.75058E-7 - 1.20073999999999970e-009 = 1.73857260000000010e-007
sigma = 5.12496E-8

Итого:
x = ( x (Am) + x (Am_2) ) / 2 = 1.78142760000000010e-007
sigma = 5.17193500000000000e-008

sigma  / x = 2.90325298653731410e-001 = 29.03%
